title: Irresponsible Captain Tylor
alternative_title: Musekinin Kanchou Tylor, 無責任艦長タイラー
description: In a distant, highly technological future, Tylor, the title character, is a mysterious young man without a real purpose in life, a state of mind that is very hard to determine, and a knack for accidentally getting out of near-death situations with a childishly cavalier attitude. He sometimes does not even seem to realize when he is in danger, which is actually an asset to him on many occasions.
